item.title: Electronic Engine Control "ENG LIM PROT" Lights (PW)

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided both EECs are operative.

placard.para: Placard ENG LIM PROT Light "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Check EICAS caution, advisory, status and EPCS maintenance page for EEC messages. If there are no EEC messages displayed, the EECs are operative.
